about_the_game:
In this exclusive demo of 'After The End,' you will have the opportunity to experience an intense and action-packed level where your main objective is to escape from a pharmacy with a vital medicine. This level is designed to showcase the gameplay and atmosphere of the full game.

In AFTER THE END, you will lead a group of survivors in a world devastated by a zombie apocalypse. Face resource scarcity, such as food and medicine, while dealing with the constant threat of zombie hordes and armed human enemies. Every decision can mean the difference between life and death, and permanent death means every choice has lasting consequences. With multiple playable characters, each with their own skills and stories, you must build and protect your base, manage your resources wisely, and fight to survive in a relentless environment.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features violence when attacking and killing zombies, as well as when being attacked or killed by them.

detailed_description:
In this exclusive demo of 'After The End,' you will have the opportunity to experience an intense and action-packed level where your main objective is to escape from a pharmacy with a vital medicine. This level is designed to showcase the gameplay and atmosphere of the full game.

In AFTER THE END, you will lead a group of survivors in a world devastated by a zombie apocalypse. Face resource scarcity, such as food and medicine, while dealing with the constant threat of zombie hordes and armed human enemies. Every decision can mean the difference between life and death, and permanent death means every choice has lasting consequences. With multiple playable characters, each with their own skills and stories, you must build and protect your base, manage your resources wisely, and fight to survive in a relentless environment.
name: After the end Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: After The End is a 2D action and survival game with pixel art aesthetics, set in a post-apocalyptic world. Face zombies and bandits while collecting resources, using various weapons, and exploring combat and strategy mechanics
